title: Follow Up on Old Lead
description: An agent wants to re-engage a lead who showed interest 6 months ago but never bought a house.

tasks.description: Find the contact record in the CRM and review past communication and search history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the contact's history, noting they were looking for a 3-bed, 2-bath under $500k.

tasks.description: Find a current, active listing that matches the lead's old criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a suitable active property on the MLS.

tasks.description: Draft and send a personalized follow-up email referencing a past conversation and suggesting the new property.
tasks.expected_outcome: A personalized email is sent to the lead to re-engage them.
